events.title: Invesco QQQ Thanksgiving Day Half Marathon, 5K, Mile & Dash
The Polar Opposite Peachtree 2026
events.description: Register through the provided Link. Ham radio opertors will be cooridinated by Atlanta ARES

events.title: Winter Field Day
events.time: Start: 1600 UTC on Saturday (11 am EST) End: 21:59 UTC on Sunday(4:59 pm EST)
events.description: Winter Field Day is an annual amateur‑radio event held on the last full weekend in January that challenges operators to set up portable stations in cold, remote conditions to practice emergency communications.

events.title: Classic City Marathon
events.description: Athens Radio Club will be coordinating ham radio operators for this event. Bob Herrin - KE4JLL, the club Public Service coordinator can provide you with more details and updates

events.title: Orlando Hamcation
events.description: Orlando HamCation is a three‑day annual ham‑radio convention in Orlando, Florida that combines vendor exhibits, technical talks, awards and social events for amateur‑radio enthusiasts.

events.title: Georgia Parks on the Air
events.time: Start: April 18, 2026 @ 8:00am EDT (1200UTC) End: April 19, 2025 @ 7:59pm EDT (2359UTC)
events.description: Georgia Parks on the Air is a weekend‑long contest that mobilizes ham operators to activate (or “hunt” from) every Georgia state park—about 50 parks—in a single 36‑hour window, rewarding contacts made from those park sites.

events.title: Dayton Hamvention
events.description: Dayton Hamvention is one of the world’s largest amateur‑radio conventions, held each May in the Dayton, Ohio area where thousands of hams gather for exhibits, vendors, workshops and community networking.

events.title: Huntsville Hamfest
events.description: Huntsville Hamfest is a two‑day ARRL‑sanctioned gathering held each August at the Von Braun Center in Huntsville, Alabama, featuring a flea market, vendor displays and family‑friendly activities for amateur‑radio enthusiasts.

events.title: No One Walks Alone – NRARC
events.description: Pathways Center and AnotherWay Foundation, Inc. will host a community walk to honor loved ones that have lost their lives to suicide and to raise funds to support individuals seeking mental health treatment that are not able to afford care.

events.title: Ferst Lewis Grizzard and Catfish Bike Ride
events.description: Coweta Ferst Readers, Inc.’s mission is to provide a free monthly age-appropriate book for every child under the age of five in Coweta County

events.title: Spin for Kids Group Bike Ride
PNC Atlanta 10 Mile and 5K
events.description: The Southeast’s largest and most iconic 10 mile race. Scenic course, skyline views.

events.title: Snowflake 10k
events.description: The race is sponsored by the Winterville Civitan Club and supports the Firefly Trail, and persons who have disabilities.
events.contact: Bob Herrin - KE4JLL of the Athens Radio Club
